New Records: Aaron Jones hit 10 sixes in a monumental unbeaten 94 from only 40 balls
Aaron Jones scored a new USA record half-century from only 22 balls
Key Match Events: Aaron Jones smashed 10 sixes in a stunning 94 not out
Aaron Jones played the innings of his life, hitting 10 sixes in a monumental unbeaten 94 from only 40 balls
Pre-Game Insights: The USA have a decent chance on what looks a very good pitch, but the scoreboard pressure is all on them
Post-Match Reflections: The player of the match is Aaron Jones
I always felt anything under 200 was chaseable – the wicket is good and the outfield is fast
I had a great innings tonight and I’m just happy to win the game for my team
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA romp to seven-wicket victory over Canada
Aaron Jones finishes the game in a hurry
Canada set the USA a target of 195 in the T20 World Cup opener
